CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides , the device performance generally varied with the length of alkyl side chains attached onto the polymer backbone.

Let's think step by step.

1. alkyl side chains
2. polymer backbone

These are the Material Name entities in the paragraph. The first one, "alkyl side chains," refers to the hydrocarbon chains attached to the main chain or backbone of a polymer. The second one, "polymer backbone," refers to the main chain or skeleton of a polymer to which side groups or branches are attached.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. alkyl side chains
2. polymer

These are the Material Name entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to specific materials. "Polymer" is a general term for a large class of materials made up of long chains of repeating units. "Alkyl side chains" are specific types of side groups that are hydrocarbon chains attached to the polymer backbone.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| alkyl side chains |
| polymer |

These are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column labeled "Material Name." The first row contains the specific material names extracted from the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides , the device performance generally varied with the length of alkyl side chains attached onto the polymer backbone.

Let's think step by step.

1. device performance
2. length of alkyl side chains
3. polymer backbone.

These are the property names mentioned in the paragraph. The first one, "device performance," refers to the ability of the device to function effectively. The other two, "length of alkyl side chains" and "polymer backbone," describe the physical properties of the polymer material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. length of alkyl side chains
2. device performance (can be considered a material property as it refers to the material's effect on the device's functionality)

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph. The length of alkyl side chains is a physical property of the polymer material that affects its interaction with the device. Device performance is a material property as it is a measure of how well the material performs in the context of the device.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| length of alkyl side chains |
| device performance |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". The length of alkyl side chains is a physical property of the polymer material, and device performance is a material property that refers to the material's effect on the device's functionality.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides , the device performance generally varied with the length of alkyl side chains attached onto the polymer backbone.

Let's think step by step.

1. Length of alkyl side chains
2. Device performance

The length of alkyl side chains and device performance are the property values mentioned in the paragraph. The length of alkyl side chains is a characteristic or property of the alkyl side chains, while device performance is a characteristic or property of the device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Length of alkyl side chains
Device performance

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| Length of alkyl side chains |
| Device performance |
